name: Easter Clicker
description:
Hey All, Thanks for checking out this game.

Have you ever played Cookie Clicker before? If so this game was inspired by that - and that I had a day free when I was on my trip and wanted to make an Easter themed game. So here it is, I hope you can all enjoy it. If enough of you ask for it I will release the game on Android, in the google play store. I haven't done now because Easter will be over by the time it gets verified.

I would explain the controls but there isn't much too them but here they are anyway:

  • Click the egg with the mouse
  • Press Escape to open/close the shop

That's it.

Enjoy Playing

If you'd like some updates or the android version leave a comment. Ill try my best, feel free to check out my other games as well :)
